args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Second-order Taylor expansion with uniform little-o remainder on compacts.
This statement translates the classical result: if f : â„^n â†’ â„ is differentiable and
its Hessian H (given here as a bilinear form valued function) is continuous on a convex
set U, then for x in a compact K âŠ† U one has
  f(x+h) = f(x) + grad x h + 1/2 H x h h + o(â€–hâ€–^2)
uniformly for x âˆˆ K as h â†’ 0.

This file provides the statement only (ended by `by sorry`). -/

variable {n : â„•}

theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_several_vars_ders_4243
  {U : Set (Fin n â†’ â„)} {f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„}
  (grad : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„)
  (H : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„)
  (hf : DifferentiableOn â„ f U)
  (H_cont : ContinuousOn (fun x => H x) U)
  (conv : Convex â„ U) :
  âˆ€ (K : Set (Fin n â†’ â„)), IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’
    âˆ€ x âˆˆ K, IsLittleO (fun h : Fin n â†’ â„ => f (x + h) - f x - grad x h - (1 / 2 : â„) * H x h h)
                                   (fun h => â€–hâ€–^2) (ğ“ (0 : Fin n â†’ â„)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Second-order Taylor expansion with uniform little-o remainder on compacts.
Statement only; proof omitted.
-/

variable {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E] [FiniteDimensional â„ E]

theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_several_vars_ders_4243
  {U : Set E} {f : E â†’ â„}
  (grad : E â†’ E â†’ â„)
  (H : E â†’ E â†’ E â†’ â„)
  (hf : DifferentiableOn â„ f U)
  (H_cont : ContinuousOn (fun x => H x) U)
  (conv : Convex â„ U) :
  âˆ€ (K : Set E), IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’
    âˆ€ x âˆˆ K, IsLittleO (fun h : E => f (x + h) - f x - grad x h - (1 / 2 : â„) * H x h h)
                                   (fun h => â€–hâ€–^2) (ğ“ (0 : E)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Second-order Taylor expansion with uniform little-o remainder on compacts.
Statement only; proof omitted.
-/

variable {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E] [FiniteDimensional â„ E]

theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_several_vars_ders_4243
  {U : Set E} {f : E â†’ â„}
  (H : E â†’ E â†’ E â†’ â„)
  (hf : DifferentiableOn â„ f U)
  (H_cont : ContinuousOn (fun x => H x) U)
  (conv : Convex â„ U) :
  âˆ€ (K : Set E), IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’
    âˆ€ x âˆˆ K, Tendsto (fun h => (f (x + h) - f x - (fderiv â„ f x) h - (1 / 2 : â„) * H x h h) / (â€–hâ€–^2))
                                   (ğ“ (0 : E)) (ğ“ (0 : â„)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Second-order Taylor expansion with uniform little-o remainder on compacts.
Statement only; proof omitted. This is a direct translation of the user statement.
-/

variable {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E] [FiniteDimensional â„ E]

theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_several_vars_ders_4243
  {U : Set E} {f : E â†’ â„}
  (H : E â†’ E â†’ E â†’ â„)
  (hf : DifferentiableOn â„ f U)
  (conv : Convex â„ U) :
  âˆ€ (K : Set E), IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’
    âˆ€ x âˆˆ K, Tendsto (fun h => (f (x + h) - f x - (fderiv â„ f x) h - (1 / 2 : â„) * H x h h) / (â€–hâ€–^2))
                                   (ğ“ (0 : E)) (ğ“ (0 : â„)) := by
